title: 336: The Benefits Of Fasting
description: Fasting can help you lose body fat, speed up your metabolism, lower blood sugar levels, reduce inflammation, increase your "youth hormone" and more. In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin discuss the ins and outs of fasting. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic and the Butt Builder Blueprint (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Get your Kimera Koffee, Mind Pump's first official sponsor, at www.kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off! Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
